hero.title: Your Legal Partner
hero.subtitle: Expert legal representation for businesses and individuals

intro.title: Real Experience, Real Results
intro.description: For over a decade, we've helped clients resolve complex legal challenges. From corporate disputes to family matters, we bring practical solutions backed by deep knowledge of Saudi legal systems.

services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: Focused legal services for the challenges you actually face

experience.title: 15+ Years in Practice
experience.description: Handling real cases in Saudi courts, not just theory

trust.title: Client-Focused Approach
trust.description: We listen first, then build strategies that work for you

results.title: Track Record That Speaks
results.description: Successful outcomes in litigation, arbitration, and negotiations

cta.title: Let's Discuss Your Case
cta.description: Schedule a consultation to explore your legal options

hero.title: About Our Practice
hero.subtitle: Built on experience, driven by results

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description: Alanazi Law was established to serve the business community and individuals facing legal challenges. We focus on practical solutions, not endless paperwork.

philosophy.title: How We Work
philosophy.description: Every case starts with understanding your situation. We cut through legal jargon to explain your options clearly, then execute strategies designed for local courts and regulations. No false promises—just honest assessment and committed representation.

integrity.title: Straight Talk
integrity.description: We tell you what you need to hear, not what you want to hear

excellence.title: Attention to Detail
excellence.description: Small oversights can cost cases—we don't miss them

commitment.title: Your Fight, Our Fight
commitment.description: When we take your case, we're in it with you until the end

hero.title: Legal Services
hero.subtitle: Specialized representation where you need it most

consultation.title: Legal Consultation
consultation.description: One-hour focused sessions to analyze your situation and map out your legal options. We review documents, identify risks, and provide actionable recommendations.

corporate.title: Business & Commercial Law
corporate.description: Company formation, partnership agreements, commercial disputes, and regulatory compliance. We handle the legal side so you can focus on growing your business.

litigation.title: Court Representation
litigation.description: Experienced representation before courts and arbitration panels. From filing to final judgment, we prepare thoroughly and argue effectively.

contracts.title: Contract Drafting & Review
contracts.description: Clear contracts prevent future disputes. We draft, review, and negotiate agreements that protect your interests while maintaining good business relationships.

advisory.title: Legal Advisory Services
advisory.description: Ongoing legal support for businesses that need regular guidance. Stay compliant, avoid pitfalls, and make informed decisions with us on call.

team.intro: Our team comprises elite lawyers and legal consultants with extensive experience and high competence

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can help with your legal matter
